name: Traffic circle
description: To warn that there is a traffic circle ahead where you may need to yield to other traffic.

name: Gentle curve
description: To warn that there is a gentle curve ahead to the right.

name: Gentle curve
description: To warn that there is a gentle curve ahead to the left.

name: Sharp curve
description: To warn that there is a sharp curve ahead to the right.

name: Sharp curve
description: To warn that there is a sharp curve ahead to the left.

name: Hairpin bend
description: To warn that there is a very sharp, U-shaped curve ahead to the right.

name: Hairpin bend
description: To warn that there is a very sharp, U-shaped curve ahead to the left.

name: Winding road
description: To warn of a series of curves ahead.

name: Winding road
description: To warn of a series of curves ahead.

name: Combined curves
description: To warn that there are two sharp curves ahead in opposite directions.

name: Combined curves
description: To warn that there are two sharp curves ahead in opposite directions.

name: Two-way traffic
description: To warn that the one-way roadway you are travelling on will soon become a two-way roadway.

name: Two-way traffic crossroad
description: To warn that one-way street you are driving on will soon be crossed by a street that carries two-way traffic.

name: Lane ends
description: To warn that the double-lane road you are driving on narrows by a full lane from the right.

name: Lane ends
description: To warn that the double-lane road you are driving on narrows by a full lane from the left.

name: Concealed driveway
description: To warn that one or more concealed driveways enter the road you are driving on from the left or right in such a way that you cannot easily see the road or traffic travelling on that road.

name: Concealed driveway
description: To warn that one or more concealed driveways enter the road you are driving on from the left or right in such a way that you cannot easily see the road or traffic travelling on that road.

name: Concealed driveway
description: To warn that one or more concealed driveways enter the road you are driving on from the left or right in such a way that you cannot easily see the road or traffic travelling on that road.

name: Danger plates
description: To warn that there is an obstruction or temporary obstruction next to the road and that the road alignment to the left or right hand side is altered.

name: Danger plates
description: To warn that there is an obstruction or temporary obstruction next to the road and that the road alignment to the left or right hand side is altered.

name: Railway crossing
description: To that there is a railway crossing with one track ahead.

name: Railway crossing
description: To that there is a railway crossing with more than one track ahead.

name: Sharp curve chevron
description: To warn that the road ahead curves suddenly to the right.

name: Sharp curve chevron
description: To warn that the road ahead curves suddenly to the left.

name: Sharp curve chevron
description: To warn that the road ahead curves suddenly to the right.

name: Sharp curve chevron
description: To warn that the road ahead curves suddenly to the left.

name: T-junction chevron
description: To warn that the road ahead does not carry on straight, but merges with another road.

name: Dead-end
description: To warn that the road does not continue beyond the sign and that a turn either to the left or to the right must be made.

name: Temporary barricade
description: To warn that part of the road is temporarily closed to traffic.

name: Gore plate sign
description: To warn that the road ahead does not carry on straight, but splits in two.

name: Gore chevron sign
description: To warn that the road ahead does not carry on straight, but splits in two.

name: Overhead danger plate sign
description: To indicate that there is an obstacle overhead.

name: Crossroad
description: To warn that a hazard in the form of a crossroad is ahead

name: Priority crossroad
description: To warn that you are approaching an intersection where you have right of way. (The thicker leg of the cross on the signs indicates which road has priority.)

name: Secondary crossroad
description: To warn that you are approaching an intersection where you have to yield to cross-traffic. (The thicker leg of the cross on the sign indicates which road has priority.)

name: T-junction
description: To warn that you are approaching an intersection where you have to turn sharp to the right or left.

name: Skew T-junction
description: To warn that you are approaching an intersection where another road meet yours at an angle.

name: Skew T-junction
description: To warn that you are approaching an intersection where another road meet yours at an angle.

name: Side road junction from the left
description: To warn that traffic may be approaching you from the left-hand side.

name: Side road junction from the right
description: To warn that traffic may be approaching you from the right-hand side.

name: Staggered junctions
description: To warn that your road is first joined by another road from the left hand side first and within a short distance by another from the right hand side

name: Staggered junctions
description: To warn that your road is first joined by another road from the left hand side first and within a short distance by another from the right first and then from the left

name: Sharp junctions
description: To warn that the road you are travelling on will soon split in two and you will have to make a choice which road to take.

name: Sharp junctions
description: To warn that traffic could merge from the left

name: Sharp junctions
description: To warn that the road you are travelling on will soon split in two and you will have to make a choice which road to take.

name: Sharp junctions
description: To warn that traffic could merge from the right

name: Y-junction
description: To warn that the road forks into two roads.

name: End of dual roadway
description: To warn that the one-way roadway is ending soon and that approaching vehicles will use the same carriageway as you.

name: End of dual roadway
description: To warn that the one-way roadway is ending soon and that approaching vehicles will use the same carriageway as you.

name: Beginning of dual roadway
description: To warn that the single carriageway is ending and that you will soon enter a one-way road.

name: Beginning of dual roadway
description: To warn that the single carriageway is ending and that you will soon enter a one-way road.

name: Traffic signals ahead
description: To warn that there are isolated and particularly new traffic lights or traffic lights near an isolated traffic light at a pedestrian crossing ahead.

name: Traffic control “STOP” ahead
description: To warn that there is a stop sign ahead, which cannot be seen in time.

name: Traffic control “YIELD” ahead
description: To warn that there is a yield sign ahead, which you may not be able to see in time without a warning.

name: Pedestrian crossing
description: To warn that there is a demarcated pedestrian crossing ahead.

name: Pedestrians
description: To warn that pedestrians may be crossing the road for the next 2 km.

name: Children
description: To warn that children might be crossing the road.

name: Pedal cyclists
description: To warn the driver that there can be cyclists ahead.

name: Domestic animals
description: To warn that there may be free ranging animals such as cattle, horses or sheep on the road.

name: Domestic animals
description: To warn that there may be free ranging animals such as cattle, horses or sheep on the road.

name: Domestic animals
description: To warn that there may be free ranging animals such as cattle, horses or sheep on the road.

name: Wild animals
description: To warn that there may be wild animals on the road or crossing the road.

name: Gate
description: To warn that there is a gate or boom across the road ahead.

name: Motor gate
description: To warn that there is a motor gate to the left

name: Motor gate
description: To warn that there is a motor gate to the right

name: Motor gate
description: To warn that there is a motor gate in the middle of the road

name: Railway crossing
description: To warn that there is a railway crossing ahead.

name: Tunnel
description: To warn that there is a tunnel ahead.

name: Height restricted
description: To warn that there is a structure ahead of which the height is indicated on the road traffic sign.

name: Length restricted
description: To warn that curves in the road or other structures on the side of the road make it impossible for vehicles longer than the length indicated on this road sign.

name: Steep ascend and steep descend
description: To warn that the road will climb or descend steeply.

name: Steep ascend and steep descend
description: To warn that the road will climb or descend steeply.

name: Slow-moving heavy vehicles
description: To warn that heavy vehicles travel slowly down a descent.

name: Gravel road begins
description: To warn that the tarred road you are driving on will end soon and will have a gravel surface ahead.

name: Narrow bridge
description: To warn that the road narrows when crossing a bridge.

name: One vehicle width structure
description: To warn that the carriageway ahead narrows to a width that will make it possible for only one vehicle at a time to pass.

name: Road narrows from both sides
description: To warn that the road ahead narrows from both sides.

name: Road narrows from one side only
description: To warn that the road ahead narrows from the left

name: Road narrows from one side only
description: To warn that the road ahead narrows from the right

name: Uneven roadway
description: To warn that there is a depression or a ridge in the road, or that the road in general is uneven and potholed.

name: Speed humps
description: To warn that there are speed humps on the carriageway ahead which require a reduction of speed.

name: Slippery road
description: To warn about unusually slippery conditions on the road ahead.

name: Falling rocks
description: To warn that rocks could fall on the carriageway from the right

name: Falling rocks
description: To warn that rocks could fall on the carriageway from the left

name: General warning
description: To warn that there is danger of some kind ahead.

name: Emergency flashing light
description: To warn of a hazard ahead.

name: Jetty edge or river bank
description: To warn that the road leads to a jetty edge or riverbank.

name: Crosswinds
description: To warn about strong crosswinds that could force your vehicles off course.

name: Drift
description: To warn the driver that there is a drift ahead and that the road could be flooded.

name: Low-flying aircraft
description: To warn of the possibility of low-flying aircraft and sudden aircraft noise near the road.

name: Agricultural vehicles
description: To warn that tractors or other slow-moving agricultural vehicles could cross or enter the road ahead.

name: Reduced visibility
description: To warn that there is a possibility reduced visibility on the road ahead that might cause a hazard to road users.

name: Congestion
description: To warn that there is a possibility of congested traffic.

name: Horses and riders
description: To warn that there is a possibility of horses and riders being present on the road ahead.

name: Elephant
description: To warn that there is a possibility of elephants being present on the road ahead.

name: Warthog
description: To warn that there is a possibility of warthogs being present on the road ahead.

name: Hippo
description: To warn that there is a possibility of hippos being present on the road ahead.

name: Width
description: To warn that there is overall width of vehicles restriction as indicated in metres on the road ahead.

name: Electrical shock
description: To warn that there is a possibility of electrical shock from the overhead electrical power cables on the road ahead.

name: Tram sign
description: To warn that there is a tram ahead.

name: Gravel road ends
description: To warn that the gravel road you are travelling on will end ahead.
